title: I'm not receiving emails for PBE account recovery
body: Today i decided to get back on the PBE to test some of the new changes for the pre-season, but i forgot my username and password. but when i clicked on forgot username i was never sent an email after waiting 30 minutes. Please help, thanks

replies.body:
Make sure it isn't sitting in your *Spam* or *Filtered* Inbox. If you still aren't seeing it, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll assist you in sorting this out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I have the same problem myself too and i checked all my email's and there are no league emails that have my pbe username or anything with that
